projects.name: The Color Store
description: Developed a front-end web application using React as the frontend.
The Color Store is a clone of Flat UI Colors which allow users to choose colors from different palettes.
The Color Store has 175+ preloaded colors to choose from.

projects.name: Notify
projects.tech: JavaScript, React, Material-UI, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB and Mongoose.
description: Notify is a note taking app.
It is a full stack application built using React and NodeJS.
For every note a URL will be generated and users can share that URL.

projects.name: Fooder
projects.tech: JavaScript, NodeJS, Express, JWT, MongoDB and Mongoose.
description: Developed back-end for food ordering application in NodeJS.
It allow users to search by dish name or vendor name.
Users can place orders and check order status via Order ID.
